original_title: 45 MOH divisions declared high-risk Dengue zones
original_body_lines: The National Dengue Control Unit said the number of Dengue cases has increased due to heavy showers in Sri Lanka.
Director of the National Dengue Control Unit Nalin Ranaweera said that 45 MOH divisions have been identified as high risk zones.
